urls.title: Carbon Dioxide In Greenhouses
urls.description: The benefits of carbon dioxide supplementation on plant growth and production within the greenhouse environment have been well understood for many years. Carbon dioxide (CO2) is an essential component of photosynthesis (also called carbon assimilation). Photosynthesis is a chemical process that uses light energy to convert CO2 and water into sugars in green plants. Growers should regard CO2 as a nutrient.

tweets.text: @DartmoorRaven01 @WestcountryRT @EnvAgency @intlrivers The health of our rivers is dictated in part by the health of our catchments so our work looks across the whole area not just the rivers so floodplains, yes but also the rest of the catchment!

@HeyRaChaCha @Floodplainmead @stwater @EnvAgencyMids @CatchmentDove Hi @HeyRaChaCha thanks for your interest. We are using a variety of data, inc lidar & hydrological models to inform the plans & getting advice from @Dynamic_Rivers & others.
@WhitePeakFarmer @stwater @EnvAgencyMids Great to see #farmer led projects. They know their land and what can achieved. Restoring and reconnecting #wetlands will be key to #climate resilience.

@WhitePeakFarmer @Floodplainmead @stwater @EnvAgencyMids @CatchmentDove Very cool. Curious what references/expertise you're drawing on for the planning of that - or is it more trial-and-error, seat-of-the-pants?

tweets.text:
@FamousFishing WTF indeed.

I've said it before and I'll say it again. The @EnvAgency is a totally failed and discredited organisation.

After Easter we will be looking for an employer volunteer to speak online to geography students about rivers.  Get in  touch if you can spare 45 minutes to inspire young people. #dreamjob @EnvAgencyNW @unitedutilities @APEM_Ltd @CRTNorthWest @PeelPorts
@Srsivanesan @pool_press @srbuss @EnvAgency Government clearly has a role in all of this but you do have to ask exactly what part the board and senior management of the EA have been playing?
